MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 & EH4 postcode ara of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Rothesay Mews and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:39am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:02am on the 30th of March 2021.
